comment.author: 22968943@N05
comment._content: Wearing a hat indoors? Tsk. Tsk.  Perhaps he just got back from lunch.  Looks like the clock reads 1:30, presumably PM not AM.  Looks like the negative has been dated March 13th 1913 (which web sources suggest was a Monday).  Notice the hand saws, prybar and pushbroom.
